backend/main.mo: Backend canister handling auth, user profiles, shareable draft links, draft comments, and invite code generation with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Aggregated feature evidence report mapping features to implementation files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including routing pages, utilities, and styling assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme color variables, dark mode, and base layout styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading fonts, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining app layout, navigation, and all route components for drafts, learning, portfolio, skills, settings, and shared drafts.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component showing app title, user level/XP, and navigation buttons for major sections.
frontend/src/components/challenge/Weekly: Renders the weekly challenge card with status, description, and navigation to the challenge page.
frontend/src/components/DraftTypeSelecto: Component rendering draft-type cards grouped by phase with mastery status, stats, and navigation into learning flow.
Displays user progress with levels, XP, mastered draft counts, and average scores using offline state.
frontend/src/data/draftTypes.ts: Defines draft type metadata, phases, and helper retrieval functions.
frontend/src/data/legalNotice.ts: Provides the anatomy, model notice, and annotations for legal notices.
frontend/src/data/scenariosBank.ts: Stores predefined drafting scenarios with metadata and lookup helpers.
frontend/src/feedback/feedbackEngine.ts: Analyzes drafts to generate scores and feedback items based on content rules.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity management.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, defines light/dark CSS variables, global typography, and print-specific styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/challenge/WeeklyChall: Displays the weekly challenge scenario, reward info, completion state, and starts a new challenge attempt.
frontend/src/pages/DraftPage.tsx: Displays draft practice overview with progress, weekly challenge, and draft type selector.
frontend/src/pages/draftType/CompareImpr: Shows the latest scored draft, model draft, and categorized feedback for comparison and improvement.
frontend/src/pages/draftType/DraftTypeLa: Provides the layout and navigation tabs for a draft type, routing to structure, wizard, practice, and compare pages.
Loads and edits a draft attempt with autosave, scenario display, and submission for feedback scoring.
frontend/src/pages/draftType/FreePractic: Lists scenarios by draft type and creates new draft attempts for free‑practice drafting.
frontend/src/pages/draftType/GuidedWizar: Presents a question‑based wizard to auto‑generate a legal notice draft and save it as an attempt.
frontend/src/pages/draftType/StructureTu: Shows the structure and annotated model notice for legal notices using an accordion tutorial.
frontend/src/pages/learn/BeforeAfterGall: Displays example draft improvements with before/after text and listed enhancements using UI cards.
frontend/src/pages/learn/ChecklistPage.t: Shows drafting checklists per draft type, rendering items with checkboxes based on URL params.
frontend/src/pages/learn/ClauseLibraryPa: Provides searchable standard clauses with copy-to-clipboard functionality and category tags.
frontend/src/pages/learn/CommonMistakesP: Lists common drafting mistakes for a draft type using an accordion with explanations and examples.
frontend/src/pages/learn/TemplatesPage.t: Renders downloadable blank templates for each draft type in TXT or printable PDF format.
frontend/src/pages/LearnPage.tsx: Renders a grid of learning resources linking to mistakes, checklists, templates, clauses, and gallery pages.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Shows grouped draft portfolio with scores, navigation to drafts, and export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PrintPreviewPage.tsx: Loads a draft attempt and provides a formatted print preview with print action and metadata display.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides settings for practice and online features plus data export, import, and reset tools.
frontend/src/pages/SharedDraftPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a shared draft with commenting functionality using an actor API.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Displays overall proficiency, individual skill scores, and recent drafts using progress indicators.
frontend/src/storage/localStore.ts: Manages persisted app state in localStorage, including initialization, migration, and draft/XP updates.
frontend/src/storage/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for drafts, scores, achievements, settings, and overall storage state.
frontend/src/storage/useOfflineState.ts: React hook that syncs component state with localStorage and exposes methods to manage draft attempts.
frontend/src/utils/exporters.ts: Provides functions to export single or multiple draft attempts as text or printable PDF using new windows and styled HTML.
frontend/src/utils/mastery.ts: Computes draft mastery status based on attempt scores and calculates an overall proficiency score from skill metrics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage-backed state for routing and tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the app’s design system.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, goals, features, requirements, and design guidelines for the Draft Master application.
